vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπολήνιον, τό,
vessel placed under a press to receive the wine or oil, vat, [LXX+NT+2nd c.AD+] adjective, κρατῆρας -ίους uncertain meaning in [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: pit for a winepress, a vat, placed under the press, ληνός, to receive the juice, Mk. 12:1*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estanque o cuba puestos bajo un lagar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
放在榨酒器下面的容器 (在東方國家通常插入地裡) , 接收壓榨出來的葡萄汁,
凹處 (可 12:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
放在榨酒器下面的容器 (在东方国家通常插入地里) , 接收压榨出来的葡萄汁,
凹处 (可 12:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bể hứng nước nho ép; nước nho
